result.execSummary:
The defendant Hunter K Scott was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Homicide by Negligent Operation/Vehicle, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.10(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Must be approved by agent before getting an occupational license after revocation period is up

miscConds.notes:
Held open for 90 days.
Restitution will be paid under the terms of a payment plan to be established with the agent but calling for no letss that 2.5% of gross wages to be paid toward restitution and to be enforced through a wage assisnment

Pay Crime Lab and Drug Assessment fee (see 'other' above for amount)

 f probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or govermental entities for the balance due.  All available actions will be used to collect the debt.

Pay DOC supervision fees

Undergo any other assessments or evaluations deemed appropriate by PO and follow through any treatment recommendations.

Participate in victim offender reconciliation program if the victim's family is willing & any expenses are to Mr. Smtih.

On every anniversary of the death during probation write a letter of apology and give to PO to distribute to family members that are willing to receive it.

On the 12th of every month during probation post on Facebook page approved by PO that may involve research you have done, message that speaks to the danger of high speed driving, insight into the crash

timeConds.notes: After 9 months can apply for EM
In each year of probation - prefer if PO thinks is an appropriate candidate to educate others

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Hunter K Scott
